title: PBE Telling me To Redownload League of Legends
body: My PBE is telling me to reinstall alpha client for league of legends and i cant use PBE because it doesnt say play/launch. Does anyone know what i can do to fix this?

replies.body:
The PBE installer should update separately from the normal launcher. You may need to go through the alpha update, but just let that installer finish up and you should be able to connect afterwards. 

If that install is giving you a lot of problems, shoot me a screenshot so that I can see exactly what you're dealing with.
